thread.title: GUILHERME E BARBOSA
thread.title_full: Gamecheap reviewed by GUILHERME E BARBOSA

author: GUILHERME E BARBOSA
title: GUILHERME E BARBOSA
text: I received my goods exactly the way it should come. I am happy everything went well my purchase however I felt that the communication between the company and client needs to be improved. There was a communicated delay but after that no shipment confirmation until I received my package all of sudden. I'd definitely do business again and recommend to my friends.
